data.caption: Annual Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) For The Quarter And Year Ended March 31, 2023
data.news_body:
This is to inform that the Board of Directors of STC India Limited at its meeting held on today i.e., May 23, 2023 has approved and taken on record the Annual Financial Results (both Standalone & Consolidated) for the Quarter and Year ended March 31, 2023. In pursuance of Regulation 33, SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, we are enclosing herewith the following:

a) Auditors'' Report on the Audited Financial Results for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2023, pursuant to Regulation 33.

b) Annual Audited Financial Results for the Quarter and Year ended March 31, 2023.

c) Statement of impact of Audit Qualification for the financial year ended 31.03.2023.

d) Declaration form the CFO as required pursuant to Regulation 33(3) of the Listing Regulations, regarding unmodified opinion of the Statutory Auditors on the Financial Results.

data.caption: Annual Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) For The Quarter And Year Ended March 31, 2023
data.news_body:
This is to inform that the Board of Directors of STC India Limited at its meeting held on today i.e., May 23, 2023 has approved and taken on record the Annual Financial Results (both Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter and Year ended March 31, 2023. In pursuance of Regulation 33, SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, we are enclosing herewith the following:
a) Auditors'' Report on the Audited Financial Results for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2023, pursuant to Regulation 33.
b) Annual Audited Financial Results for the Quarter and Year ended March 31, 2023.
c) Statement of impact of Audit Qualification for the financial year ended 31.03.2023.
d) Declaration form the CFO as required pursuant to Regulation 33(3) of the Listing Regulations, regarding unmodified opinion of the Statutory Auditors on the Financial Results.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results (Limited Reviewed) For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended On December 31, 2022
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, this is to inform that the Board of Directors of the Company, at its meeting held today i.e. February 09, 2023, considered and approved the Statement of Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended on December 31, 2022.

Statement of Unaudited Financial Results along with Limited Review Report of the Statutory Auditors for the quarter ended on December 31, 2022 and Press Release are enclosed herewith.

It may be mentioned that due to vacant position of Chairman & Managing Director, the compliance certificate under regulation 33(2)(a) of SEBI (LODR), 2015 has been signed by Chief Financial Officer only. Further, the accounts of subsidiary company i.e. STCL Limited have not been approved by STCL Limited Board due to incomplete Board in STCL Limited.

The Board meeting commenced at 02:00 P.M. and concluded at 05:30 P.M.

data.caption: Disclosure Of Related Party Transactions Pursuant To Regulation 23(9) Of The SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirement) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the disclosure of related party transactions for the period ended on September 30, 2022.Please take note of above information on record.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results (Limited Reviewed) For The Quarter And Half Year Ended On September 30, 2022
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, this is to inform that the Board of Directors of the Company, at its meeting held today i.e. November09, 2022, considered and approved the Statement of Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter ended on September 30, 2022.

Statement of Unaudited Financial Results along with Limited Review Report of the Statutory Auditors for the quarter ended on September 30, 2022 and Press Release are enclosed herewith.

It may be mentioned that due to vacant position of Chairman & Managing Director, the compliance certificate under regulation 33(2)(a) of SEBI (LODR), 2015 has been signed by Chief Financial Officer only. Further, the accounts of subsidiary company i.e. STCL Limited have not been approved by STCL Limited Board due to incomplete Board in STCL Limited.

The Board meeting commenced at 02:30 P.M. and concluded at 06:45 P.M.

Please take note of the above document & information on record.

data.caption: Annual Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) For The Quarter And Year Ended March 31, 2022
data.news_body:
This is to inform that the Board of Directors of STC Limited at its meeting held on today i.e., May 27, 2022 has approved and taken on record the Annual Financial Results (both Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter and Year ended March 31, 2022. In pursuance of Regulation 33, SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, we are enclosing herewith the following:

a) Auditors'' Report on the Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2022, pursuant to Regulation 33.

b) Annual Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the Quarter and Year ended March 31, 2022.

c) Statement of impact of Audit Qualification (Standalone & Consolidated) for the financial year ended 31.03.2022.

d) Declaration form the CFO as required pursuant to Regulation 33(3) of the Listing Regulations, regarding unmodified opinion of the Statutory Auditors on the Financial Results.

(Consolidated) for the quarter &nine months ended on December 31, 2021.

data.caption: Annual Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) For The Quarter And Year Ended March 31, 2020
data.news_body:
This is to inform that the Board of Directors of STC Limited at its meeting held on June 25; 2021 has approved and taken on record the Annual Financial Results for the quarter
and Year ended March 31, 2021.
we are enclosing herewith the following:
a) Auditors'' Report on the Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2021, pursuant to Regulation 33.
b) Annual Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the Quarter and Year ended March 31, 2021.
c) Statement of impact of Audit Qualification (Standalone & Consolidated) for the financial year ended 31.03.2021.
d) Declaration form the CFO as required pursuant to Regulation 33(3) of the Listing Regulations, regarding unmodified opinion of the Statutory Auditors on the
Financial Results.
The Meeting of the Board of Directors commenced at 03:00 P.M. and concluded at 04.30 P.M. However, the delay in uploading Financial Results is due to unavoidable
reasons.
